Walkthru Bldg 2 – 39997

(and areas nearby)

Sunday, July 29, 2001

I’m including everything I found during the walkthroughs including "long-term" projects. I’ll indicate these as LT (indicating they won’t get fixed immediately and might need board approval, but nevertheless good things to get on our radar if not already). Sometimes I’ll indicate "north", "east", etc, stairways. This of course is relative to the building itself (and I apologize for not specifying to the level of, say, "northwest").

This walkthrough generally encompasses routine inspections of the immediate grounds inside and outside the building. It covers tasks that maintenance and/or janitorial staff should be able to fix. It does not cover tasks that we are not qualified to make any comments about, since we are not licensed professionals, or might in any way compromise our safety: assessing elevator reliability, determining if fire extinguishers are working properly, etc. All we can do in these cases is indicate a potential problem.

  • David Epstein

South Parking Lot area (near Stevenson Blvd):

  • Near South parking exit, near space 44, tall lamp light is burnt out.
  • Cobwebs over carport fluorescent lights
  • Side woodwork in garbage bin area is broken up. Needs repair.
  • Murieta sign (Cedar & Stevenson): has all sorts of crap on it.

Between bldg 2 and 1 gate entrance:

  • Grime on lower sandstone. An eyesore.

Entrance of bldg 2 (39997):

  • Step areas need to be swept.
  • Intercom area dusty.
  • Grime on lower left sandstone, near the window.
  • My own key didn’t open entrance door (looks like a new lock).

Interior areas:

  • Shopping cart near elevator.
  • Garbage full near elevator.
  • Fountain is dirty.
  • Fountain not working.
  • Fountain wall light not working.
  • Inside elevator: scratches on interior door.
  • Elevator was slightly "bumpy" between 2nd & 3rd floor.

North side exterior stairs area (all floors):

  • 1st floor tile areas are filthy.
  • 1st à 2nd floor stairs are very dirty.
  • Brown railing paint is chipping (1st à 2nd floors)
  • 2nd floor tile area is dirty.
  • Fluorescents are utterly filthy.
  • Some minor cracks & chips on 2nd à 3rd floor stairs.

South side exterior stairs area (all floors):

  • 1st floor tiles need to be cleaned.
  • Also concrete area beneath steps are dirty.
  • 1st à 2nd floor steps are very dirty.
  • Minor chipped paint on brown railing between 1st and 2nd floors.
  • (LT?) Concrete support beneath top stair, between 1st & 2nd floors, appears to be cracking a bit.
  • Tiles between 1st & 2nd floors are dirty.
  • Very dirty stairs between 1st & 2nd floors.
  • Filthy fluorescents.
  • Shopping cart on 2nd floor area.
  • Stairs between 2nd & 3rd floors need to be swept.
  • Bird doo doo on 3rd floor tiles and railings.
  • Small tube light just outside 3rd floor exit door is burned out.
  • Exterior handle of 3rd floor exit door is flimsy.

 

 

1st Floor hallway:

  • Some dirt between tiles in alcove near 148.
  • Plug near 147 is loose.
  • Some minor grime near this plug outlet.
  • Fluorescent light near 146 is burnt out.
  • Carpet stains near 145 & 146.
  • Attached matt near 144 is a little dirty.
  • All fluorescents are dirty.
  • Elevator room 201, near unit 150, the door has grime marks.
  • Grime on wall near elevator room door.
  • Carpet stain near 151.
  • Streak mark on walls near 151.
  • Exit wooden door (with magnet) near 148 is broken. Sign was put up on 5/30/01!
  • 1st floor, outer south door key gets stuck (noticed by a homeowner).
  • 1st floor, north side, attached matt near 154 is filthy.
  • Brown frame woodwork on elevator is scratched.

2nd floor hallways:

  • North exit door, exterior handle is scratched.
  • Carpet stains near 253 & 254.
  • Plug outlet is loose near 253.
  • Some wall markings near 252.
  • Plug is loose near 251.
  • Fluorescents dirty.
  • Exterior plastic of fluorescent light near 250 is partially broken.
  • Carpet streak between 250 & elevator.
  • Wall marks between 250 & elevator.
  • Dirty lower windows near 249.
  • Minor wall marks near 249.
  • Small tube light near elevator is burnt out.
  • Antique light near elevator is burnt out.
  • Loose plug near 248.
  • Carpet stains near 248.
  • Brooms were left in alcove near 248.
  • Carpet stains near 247.
  • Lower plug near 245 gets stuck.
  • South side, exterior door, doesn’t completely close unless you nudge it.

 

3rd floor hallways:

  • Exit door, south side, the exterior handle is flimsy.
  • Plug near 347 is cracked.
  • Carpet stain near 347.
  • Some white powder on brown tile near alcove & 348.
  • Plug opposite elevator and near 348 is smashed in.
  • Small streak on tile near elevator.
  • Need screens! (my ‘original’ thought for the day. ; )
  • Carpet stains near elevators
  • Absolutely filthy carpet stains near 350 & utility room.
  • (LT?) Drill holes in utility room door.
  • (LT) Grime on lower sandstone near alcove entrance (near 350 & utility room).
  • Carpet stain near 351.
  • 2 loose plugs, one near 350, one near 354.
  • Fluorescent burnt out near 354.
  • Fluorescent light cover is cracked.
